roleset.name: causer
roleset.note: CURDLE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from curdle.01-v)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: I looked for Jessica to materialize out of the clogging , curdling crowd and ,as the time passed and I waited , a fiend came to life beside me and whisperedin my ear : How was I planning [*-1] to greet Jessica [*T*-2]? ?
